response.original_title: Crazy Mohan's Marriage Made in Saloon
response.overview: The aptly named actor, comedian and playwright Crazy Mohan stars in this film version of his farcical play of the same name. Set in a saloon, the action centers on "Bet" Padmanabhan (Mohan), who challenges a patron (Madhu Balaji) to win the heart of Janaki (Madhumathi) -- Padmanabhan's eccentric daughter. But because she has her hopes pinned on marrying someone with a physical disability, Janaki's would-be suitor is forced to feign blindness.
response.title: Crazy Mohan's Marriage Made in Saloon

results.name: CRAZY MOHAN'S MARRIAGE MADE IN SALOON HINDI SCENE 6
